review: Bought as a gift for my husband.  Between his Netflix account and my Prime membership, he's in movie heaven.  This seems to stream movies much faster and clearer than our DVD player and our Roku.  I love that it has an android app so we can use that as well as the one that comes with it.
author: K. Buratt

review: Has all the functionality of Chromecast + a remote. This device has a really solid connection to my Wifi Network. I never experience streaming drop outs. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is I had a hell of a time connecting to the device with the amazon app, The device has to be active, but not currently streaming. And then half the time it still doesn't show up.
author: andoerin

review: So far I just love the fire stick. For the price it was worht it. I was abale to access my fire tv account perfectly. The remote is just the same , but with out the speak option. No matter to me. Seams to be a tad sloower then the firetv box, but hardly a problem.
author: evie

review: A beautifully designed OSD makes navigating between multiple sites (like Hulu, Netflix, Amazon...) brilliantly smooth and easy. It's fast, simple, and has a great remote. If you've ever used a streaming bluray player or smart tv, most of the time the navigation is awful. This thing even works nicer than my computer.I only have one minor gripe with the remote design: it's a slick little unit, but I think the "home" button is too close to the "pause" button. I hit it accidentally all the time. I wish they'd change that.
author: R "sir_rob79"

review: There is a big difference. Roku allows Amazon as just one more content provider, but lacks the control and management, and the ease of use that comes from Amazon, for Amazon Instant Video. As just one example, you cannot remove recently viewed movies from the screen of Roku. This and many more management tools are automatically part of the Fire TV Stick user experience. Small, works perfectly, excellent quality images and Instant Prime - centric. Returned Roku and never been happier with a replacement product that better meets my needs.
author: D. J. Donaldson

review: Love it - does just what it says.
author: jeff johnson

review: Worked fine at first, now cannot watch even Amazon Prime shows without multiple buffering lapses; sometimes even loss of connection entriely. Not sure if technology is overloaded, or what.I would sure like an explanation from Amazon, as to what has changed??????
author: Dave K.

review: you still have to "pay" to watch videos and tv episodes they misclaim over 400,000 movies and shows to watch, I mean it is possible but you have to pay for every single movie or show you want to watch. I should of never had ordered this product.
author: Jorge Garza

review: Received before stated time. I had difficultly putting the batteries in the remote, but after that it was a breeze to setup and use. Will buy an additional unit for my lake cottage. When I say it was easy to setup and use, I am in my earlier 70s and I did not have any problems other than the battery installation. Thanks amazon for a well made and easy to use product.
author: Robert C. Jones
